    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AccountController
    Controller for the user account view.
    BugStatus
    Enum holding a bug status
    ChildControllerListener
    Interface for pages communication, specifically for printing errors
    Comment
    Class that holds comments that can be assigned to issues
    FilterController
    Controller responsible for filtering issues based on multiple criteria such as status, priority, author, date range, ID, and title.
    HelloApplication
    Application runner
    InvalidIssueDataException
    Custom exception for signalizing impropoer Issue creation/edition
    Issue
    Class for storing Issue details
    IssueCell
    A custom ListCell implementation for displaying Issue objects inside a ListView.
    IssueManager
    Class holding all issues
    IssueNotFoundException
    Custom exception for signalizing that no such issue exists
    IssuesListController
    Controller responsible for displaying the list of all issues in the application.
    IssueViewController
    Controller for displaying the detailed view of a single Issue.
    Launcher
    Launches the application
    MainAppWindowController
    Controller for the main application window.
    NewIssueController
    Controller responsible for creating and editing issues in the application.
    Priority
    Enum holding priority status of an issue
    User
    Represents a user in the system with basic profile information, unique identifier, creation and activity timestamps, and a list of roles.
    UserRole
    Enum holding user role
